entities.name: User
entities.description: Users, Teachers and Students are human beings that are teaching or studying in a class respectively. A single User class represents both teachers and students with role property distinguishing the user's role. When creating a user, the API returns a sourcedIdPairs object mapping between suppliedSourcedId (provided) and allocatedSourcedId (assigned).
fields: dateLastModified: string (ISO datetime with UTC timezone, required)

entities.name: Organization
entities.description: Represents an organization in the system such as a department, school, district, or other educational institution.

entities.name: Course
entities.description: A course represents a subject or area of study. It can contain multiple components and is typically associated with an organization (school/district). Courses can be reused across academic terms.
fields: dateLastModified: string (ISO datetime with UTC timezone, required)

entities.name: Class
entities.description: A class represents a specific instance of a course, typically for a particular term/semester. Classes are what students actually enroll in, not courses directly. A course can have multiple classes across different terms.
fields: dateLastModified: string (ISO datetime with UTC timezone, required)

entities.name: CourseRef
entities.description: Reference to a course, used when linking classes to courses

entities.name: Enrollment
entities.description: Represents a student or teacher's enrollment in a class. Enrollments link users to classes with a specific role and period of time.
fields: dateLastModified: string (ISO datetime with UTC timezone, required)

entities.name: AcademicSession
entities.description: Represents an academic time period such as a term, semester, grading period, or school year. Academic sessions can be hierarchical (e.g. a semester within a school year) and are used to organize classes.
fields: dateLastModified: string (ISO datetime with UTC timezone, required)
parent: object|null (reference to parent academic session)

entities.name: Resource
entities.description: Educational resources like videos, documents, or interactive content. Resources are created with a vendorResourceId and receive an allocatedSourcedId from the system. The metadata requirements vary based on the resource type (video, audio, text, etc).
fields: dateLastModified: string (ISO datetime with UTC timezone, required)

entities.name: ComponentResource
entities.description: A resource that is linked to a component
fields: dateLastModified: string (ISO datetime with UTC timezone, required)

entities.name: Component
entities.description: Components are building blocks within a course, like units, lessons, or modules. They can contain resources and other components, allowing for hierarchical course structure.
fields: dateLastModified: string (ISO datetime with UTC timezone, required)

entities.name: ComponentRef
entities.description: Reference to a component, used when linking components to courses or other components

entities.name: AssessmentTest
entities.description: A QTI 3.0 compliant assessment test containing one or more test parts, which organize questions into sections.
fields: identifier: string (A unique code identifying the test, required)
title: string (The name of the test, required)
qtiVersion: string (Version of QTI standard, default: 3.0)
toolName: string (Name of the tool used to create the test)
toolVersion: string (Version of the tool used)
timeLimit: number (Maximum time allowed in minutes)
maxAttempts: number (Maximum number of attempts allowed)
toolsEnabled: object (List of tools available during the test)
qti-test-part: array[TestPart] (Array of Test Parts, min: 1, required)
qti-outcome-declaration: array[OutcomeDeclaration] (Array of outcome declarations for scoring)

entities.name: TestPart
entities.description: Test Parts are major divisions within an Assessment Test that can contain multiple sections. Each Test Part must have navigation and submission settings.
fields: identifier: string (A unique code identifying the test part, required)
navigationMode: string (How questions can be accessed: linear|nonlinear, required)
submissionMode: string (How answers can be submitted: individual|simultaneous, required)
qti-assessment-section: array[Section] (Array of sections with their configurations, required, min: 1)

entities.name: Section
entities.description: Sections are groups of questions within a test part. They help organize questions into logical groups.
fields: identifier: string (A unique code identifying the section, required)
title: string (The name of the section, required)
visible: boolean (Whether the section is visible to the student, required)
required: boolean (Whether the section must be completed)
fixed: boolean (Whether the order of items is fixed)

entities.name: ItemRef
entities.description: References to assessment items within a section.
fields: identifier: string (A unique code identifying the item reference, required)
href: string (Reference to the assessment item, required)
required: boolean (Whether the item must be completed)
fixed: boolean (Whether the item position is fixed)
category: array[string] (Categories the item belongs to)

entities.name: OutcomeDeclaration
entities.description: Declarations for storing assessment results and scores.
fields: identifier: string (A unique code identifying the outcome, required)
defaultValue: object (Default value for the outcome)
